name: Nice Power System
description: supplying a quality assured range of UPS
overview:
Established in the year 2003, we “Nice Power System” are engaged in manufacturing and supplying a quality assured range of Home UPS, Stabilizers, SMPS Based Battery Charger.

Our Products : Home UPS Online UPS Mini CFL UPS Voltage Stabilizer UPS Card Stabilizer Card AC Voltmeter Lift Inverter SMPS Based Battery Charger

Our Infrastructure; All these units are installed with requisite machines, equipment and tools that are essential in the bulk production of our range. We regularly upgrade these machines and equipment so as to maintain the high production capability intact.

Quality Assurance: We have a decade of experience in this domain that enables us to understand the fact that only quality products can maximize the satisfaction levels of clients and thereby improve the image of the company. Thus, our quality controllers ensure that all the production and post production stages are executed in compliance with the industry standards.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client-centric organization since our inception and ensure that their exact demands are fulfilled in an effective and timely manner. Following ethical practices, we offer quality assured range of UPS, Stabilizers and SMPS Based Battery Chargers to our clients.

Why Us? We emerged as one of the leading stockist and dealer of Stabilizer, SMPS Based Battery Charger & UPS. Our products are acclaimed for their premium finish and high efficiency. Our staff ensures to manufacture the best product in the market keeping client satisfaction in mind. With this approach we emerged as known name in the Indian market.
